title: GET_PED_RELATIONSHIP_GROUP_HASH
content:
0x354F283C// GetPedRelationshipGroupHash
Hash GET_PED_RELATIONSHIP_GROUP_HASH(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target pedReturns: The relationship group hash.Gets the current relationship group hash of a ped.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_RELATIONSHIP_GROUP_HASH
GetPedRelationshipGroupHash(ped)
